sentences.sContent: The main symptoms are fever, chills, headache, malaise and muscle pain (myalgia).
sentences.sContent_eng: The main symptoms are fever, chills, headache, malaise and muscle pain (myalgia).
sentences.sCn: 主要症状为发热、寒战、头痛、倦怠和肌痛。

sentences.sContent: In Orissa state, India, 4904 cases of fever associated with myalgia and headache have been reported between 27 February - 5 March 2006.
sentences.sContent_eng: In Orissa state, India, 4904 cases of fever associated with myalgia and headache have been reported between 27 February - 5 March 2006.
sentences.sCn: 在印度奥里萨邦，2006年2月27日至3月5日报告了4 904例与肌痛和头痛有关的发热病例。

sentences.sContent: Clinical features common to the three patients initially include fever, headache, diarrhoea and myalgia developing into rash and hepatic dysfunction, followed by rapid deterioration and death.
sentences.sContent_eng: Clinical features common to the three patients initially include fever, headache, diarrhoea and myalgia developing into rash and hepatic dysfunction, followed by rapid deterioration and death.
sentences.sCn: 这三位病人的共同临床症状是，最初发烧、头痛、腹泻和肌痛，接着出现皮疹和肝功能障碍，然后病情迅速恶化和死亡。

trans.tranOther: pain in a muscle or a group of muscles
